meanings.sent1: The old bike was rustier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: The metal gate became rustier after being left out in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The rustier car in the junkyard looked like it had a colorful paint job.
meanings.sent4: Her trust in him was rustier than the old, creaky door hinges.
meanings.sent5: The rustier nails were difficult to remove from the wooden plank.

meanings.sent1: The abandoned ship was rustier than any other vessel in the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The tools in the shed were rustier than they had ever been before.
meanings.sent3: His memory of the event was rustier than an old, forgotten treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between the two friends had grown rustier over time.
meanings.sent5: The rustier pipes needed immediate replacement to avoid leaks.

meanings.sent1: The rustier spots on the car needed to be sanded and repainted.
meanings.sent2: The hinges on the gate were getting rustier with each passing day.
meanings.sent3: The rustier areas of the metal sculpture added a unique touch to its design.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded rustier after not speaking for hours.
meanings.sent5: The rustier patches on the roof indicated a need for maintenance.

meanings.sent1: The old bridge was rustier than the railings along the river.
meanings.sent2: The antique car was rustier than the modern vehicles in the showroom.
meanings.sent3: The rustier key in the bunch was the one that opened the mysterious chest.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of childhood were rustier than her sibling's recollections.
meanings.sent5: The rustier tools were set aside for cleaning and restoration.
